ECProperty.description: Number of times this annotation can be placed

ECStructProperty.description: Component handler for placement and manipulation

ECProperty.description: Determines if the property is related to graphical representation.

ECClass.description: Values that have actions (Key-Ins) associated with them.

ECProperty.description: Value must be from the list.
Selects the component that property belongs to before executing any action (Keyin).

ECClass.description: Update Property From Standard Action Value from Display String
Set the active associated item. This can be used to disable the initial relationship. This can be done to enable inheritance of a related associated item.

ECProperty.description: Name of Element template used for component.

ECClass.description: Default CAD lock settings for placement

ECProperty.description: Axis lock start angle in degrees
Axis lock increment angle in degrees
Number of arcs used to create cloud around a component during automatic placement when the user has not specified Arc Length and Arc Radius.
Gap between outline of range of component and outline of range used to create cloud.
Causes the cloud to be made with inverted arcs i.e. arcs pointing towards the center of the cloud, instead of away from it.
Indicate whether a component can be inserted
Indicate whether a component can be replaced
Allow repeat insertion of this component
Indicate whether a component can be mirrored
Indicate whether a component can be moved
Indicate whether a component can be rotated
Indicate whether a component can be scaled
Indicate whether related annotation should be transformed with this component
Parent component is always displayed. Selected annotation will display parent component in element info, fly over and icons.
Determines the life cycle state of a component.
Determines if a components state is valid within the application design session. The value is used as a way to measure integrity for a component within a drawing.
Reason why component is considered to have a InValid Validation State.
Flag to establish that a component has existing elements such as a converted item or existing geometry
Flag to establish that a component uses graphics from class definition
Field name being annotated of parent component
Determines the life cycle state of a component.
Element template to set when invalid

ECClass.description: Custom Attribute Class for Logical Group Config Parameters

ECProperty.description: Name of class containing the list of components to insert by default
Name of relationship class used for logical grouping of components
Determines the default types that can be added to a Logical Group.

ECClass.description: Assembly of components that make up a complex component or system. The components can be treated as single object or as individual objects based on insertion settings.

ECProperty.description: number of arcs on the smallest side
ECProperty.displayLabel: Number of Arcs on Smallest Side

ECClass.description: Custom attribute used as a exclude filter for Component Builder

ECProperty.description: Determines if subclasses of this class are excluded

Source.roleLabel: Is connected to BMF Connect Point

Target.roleLabel: Is connected from BMF Connect Point

ECProperty.description: Determines if a Document has been initialized
Indicate whether a component can be inserted from ECB
Optional property to filter down the classes that get updated. If not filled out all items of the related type will be updated.
Property Name of a Related Class that will be updated as result of this property change
Indicates if the Property Value change should be cascaded to the Related Property Name
Sets the Related Property Name value to the value related property

ECClass.description: Notify related component of property value change
ECClass.displayLabel: Notify Related Component of Property Value Change

ECClass.description: List of displayable properties that can be shown in the element info

ECProperty.displayLabel: Expression that can be used to parse property
Display message on invalid input of ranges
Apply Key In To Related Components

ECClass.description: Used as means of configuring notification of property changes between related objects.

ECProperty.description: Direction of the relationship to notify (Backward=0 & Forward=1). This is only applicable within a Property.

ECProperty.displayLabel: Property Name to get values from
